patterns.resolution: Ensure proper type casting or fix type definitions

patterns.pattern: Cloud Run region mismatch with Cloud SQL
patterns.resolution: Ensure all GCP services use asia-east1
patterns.preventionRule: Always verify gcloud config before deployment

patterns.resolution: Properly await async operations in tests
patterns.preventionRule: Use proper async/await patterns in all tests

patterns.resolution: Always await params in Next.js 15 routes
patterns.preventionRule: export default async function Page(props) { const params = await props.params; }
